703908f-a.text:
Cropsey Ave., northward between Bay 37th and Bay 38th Streets. At the left foreground is 8812 to 8806 Twenty-Fourth Ave. The tall building in the background is P.S. No. 101 at the S.W. corner of Twenty-Fourth
and Benson Aves.
April 27, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
703908f-a.folder: Cropsey Avenue & Bay 37th Street, Brooklyn, NY

704803f-a.text:
2402 Harway Ave., at the S.w. corner of Bay 37th Street.
March 1925.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
704803f-a.folder: Harway Avenue & Bay 37th Street, Brooklyn, NY
